name: BEHEMOTH BUNDY BUNDLE - "THE COMPLETE CHARLES J COLLECTION" *(ON SALE!!)*
description: **THE CHARLES J COMPLETE COLLECTION** I've put together the "BEHEMOTH BUNDY BUNDLE" that includes my COMPLETE COLLECTION, as in EVERY PACK currently for sale! **The ""BEHEMOTH BUNDY BUNDLE" includes EVERYTHING: 1. GRISLY GALLOWS KIT 2. DEATH DRUMS BUNDLE 3. DEATHFARM 4. THE PANZER KICK If you haven't picked up my Drum Samples or Pod Farm tones yet, THIS IS THE TIME! See individual product pages for audio examples! Happy Holidays!!! <3, Charles J

name: DEATH FARM - VIOLENCE FOR PODFARM (NO ADD-ONS NEEDED!)
description:
NOTE: YOU DO NOT NEED ANY OF THE PODFARM ADD-ON PACKS FOR ANY OF MY TONES! =D

Jb Vd Wal of ABORTED wrote this AMAZING example using the tones within "DEATH FARM"!


DEATH FARM PATCHES USED:

KING CONQUER RHYTHM
KING CONQUER RHYTHM VARIATION
CLANDESTINED CLEAN
ABSTRACTION LEAD
SHRED LD 1
-------------------------------

DEATH FARM is a collection of 8 tones in total for PODFARM(one heavy rhythm and 7 various lead, clean, ambient and overall very UNIQUE patches)

Patches included can be heard on records I've mixed and mastered including; BETRAYING THE MARTYRS, King Conquer, ABIOTIC, Thy Art Is Murder (Infinite Forms Pre-Production), Forty Winters, Silence, After Me The Flood and a few more I just can't recall, haha...

RIDICULOUS EXAMPLE OF 3 "DEATH FARM" PATCHES BY JOHN GALLOWAY:


The clean guitar is the CLANDESTINED CLEAN patch

The lead guitar is the AMOEBA AMBIENT LEAD patch

The rhythm is the KING CONQUER VARIATION patch

There's no post processing after any of the patches, aside from LP and HP!

Drum Samples from the Death Drums Pack:
OVERDOSE KICK
HOLLOW POINT SNARE

ANOTHER CUSTOMER EXAMPLE BY TONY DAVIS:

------------------------------- "DEATHFARM" TONES INCLUDED:

ABSTRACTION LEAD

AMOEBA AMBIENT LEAD

CLANDESTINED CLEAN

KING CONQUER RHYTHM

KING CONQUER RHYTHM VARIATION

SHRED LEAD 1

SHRED LEAD 2

TRETCHEROUS TREADPLATE

name: CHARLES J - GRISLY GALLOWS KIT - (TCI, NKI + WAV)!
description:
BRINGING VIOLENCE, PUNCH and VIBE with a TWIST is what this kit is all about! The "CHARLES J - GRISLY GALLOWS KIT" is a FULLY MULTI-SAMPLED kit! (The FIRST in a SERIES of FULL KITS from Charles J!). *INCLUDED FORMATS:* TCI, NKI and WAV! LISTEN HERE: CHARLES J - GRISLY GALLOWS
DRY DRUM SAMPLES EXAMPLE!

UNPROCESSED CUSTOMER EXAMPLE!: PREFACE: I noticed a SHOCKING LACK of euphonic, but VIOLENT; STEREO ROOM SNARE SAMPLES. So I decided to take matters into my own hands. HERE IS THE RESULT: CHARLES J - GRISLY GALLOWS ROOMS EXAMPLE *(THE ABOVE EXAMPLE CLIP IS A MONTAGE OF ALL 8 ROOM SOUNDS; ROOMS CHANGE EACH MEASURE)* **SCROLL DOWN FOR MORE INFO!** NOTES: The drum shells were recorded and engineered by CHARLES J @ Sonic Assault Studios! In ADDITION to the SHELL SAMPLES, I took the samples of the SLEDGEHAMMER SNARE, and created and captured (8) (yes, EIGHT) Custom Charles J Room Samples! through varying, all organic processes. From AMAZING sounding, BIG SOUNDING LIVE ROOMS; to a few UNIQUE spaces that sounded great. There are 8 (YES, EIGHT) seperate STEREO ROOM SAMPLES for the SLEDGEHAMMER SNARE! The KICK + TOMS share 1 (ONE) STEREO ROOM option; both sampled in the same room. GEAR: KICK - DW Collectors Series > D6 > 1073 SNARE - Black Panther SLEDGEHAMMER - 6.5x14 > 57 + ATM450 > 1073 TOMS - DW Collectors Series > Sennheiser MD421 U4 > 1073 *(PLEASE NOTE: THIS PACK DOES NOT CONTAIN ANY CYMBALS)* KISSES, Charles J
**You may use these in any commercial or non-commercial recording or audio setting. By purchasing this item, you agree to not resell this sample as a work of your own.**

name: CHARLES J - DEATH DRUMS BUNDLE - (TCI, NKI + WAV)!
description:
My first foray into drum samples started with the "ONE SHOT DEATH SNARES" and shortly thereafter, the "DEATH KICKS" collection. These samples are about to celebrate their ONE YEAR birthday since being released and as a result, I've decided to COMBINE them into one VIOLENT, MEGA DEATH BUNDLE!: INTRODUCING: CHARLES J's - "DEATH DRUMS" BUNDLE! ALL of the original samples from BOTH collections, now available as a SINGLE BUNDLE for your enjoyment! ...and oh yeah, they're even CHEAPER. These will be DISCONTINUED soon in place of the second incarnation of my DEATH DRUMS ideology. GET 'EM WHILE YOU CAN, LADS! This bundle WILL NOT be available for very long! Without further ado, below you will find information for each pack along with, of course; EXAMPLE CLIPS! /end transmission ------------------------------ "CHARLES J - DEATH KICKS" "DESTROY; RATHER THAN CREATE WHAT'S MEANINGLESS" I present to you the "DEATH KICKS" collection consisting of 28 DISCRETE KICK DRUMS (each containing at least 2-4 multisampled HARD hits) and guaranteed to SONICALLY hold up to their aptly titled name. Inside you'll hear kicks that could hold their own in any mix, or make a great 'blender kick, for say; instantly adding mid- range punch. You'll also find kicks that add some serious low end weight to the table. Kicks that cut like a KNIFE; and a few that are so mangled that, well....it's sickening. =D INCLUDED FORMATS: TCI, NKI and WAV! FUN FOR EVERYONE! *DEATH KICKS MONTAGE CLIP:* CLICK ME! NOTE: KICK SAMPLE CHANGES EVERY MEASURE! -------------------- "CHARLES J - ONE SHOT DEATH SNARES" I've found that in the years I've been mixing I ALWAYS end up blending at least a single one shot under my more dynamic, natural snare sound. What this yields for me personally is the best of both worlds. You get the VIBE of the dynamic snare with the SMACK, IMPACT and most importantly; the VIOLENCE the one shot adds! INCLUDED FORMATS: TCI, NKI and WAV! FUN FOR EVERYONE! *DEATH SNARES EXAMPLE CLIP*: CLICK ME! NOTE: First half of the clip is dry; second time around a DEATH SNARE is VERY subtly blended in!
**You may use these in any commercial or non-commercial recording or audio setting. By purchasing this item, you agree to not resell this sample as a work of your own.**
